_comment: %%% The following are commands on the page

undo.tooltip: Undo editing and return to original state

trash.tooltip: Delete this data element from the Constellation

date.tooltip: Dates associated with this data element

scm.tooltip: SNAC Control Metadata for this data element

_comment: %%% The following are global data elements

entitytype.tooltip: The type of the entity described

snaccontrolmetadata.tooltip: Control metadata applied to the entire Constellation

ark.tooltip: The permanent identifier for this Constellation

constellationid.tooltip: The permanent numeric SNAC identifier for this Constellation

language.tooltip: The ISO-standard language of this data element

script.tooltip: The ISO-standard script of this data element

descriptiveNote.tooltip: A note about this data element

languageUsed.tooltip: The ISO-standard language used by the identity described in this Constellation

scriptUsed.tooltip: The ISO-standard script used by the identity described in this Constellation

nameEntry.tooltip: Name entry elements for this Constellation

nameHeading.tooltip: The computed name heading from the components

components.tooltip: The ordered components of the name

preferenceScore.tooltip: The numerical preference of this name entry in SNAC

nameComponents.tooltip: An ordered list of name components, each parameterized by a Part type

rulesForm.tooltip: Type of the name based on these descriptive rules

rulesSet.tooltip: Descriptive rules used to formulate this name heading

rules.tooltip: Descriptive rules used to formulate this name heading

existDate.tooltip: Dates of existence for this Constellation

singleDate.tooltip: A date element, similar to EAC-CPF date tags

dateRange.tooltip: A date element, similar to EAC-CPF dateRange tags

machineDate.tooltip: Machine-readable date, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.  Pieces are required left-to-right, but day or day and month may be left off.

naturalDate.tooltip: The date in a human readable format. This date should only be used for reference.

dateType.tooltip: Defines what type of date this is

fuzzyRange.tooltip: If the date is imprecise, i.e. 2nd century, use these fields to give bounds on the imprecision, i.e. 0100-0199

startMachineDate.tooltip: Machine-readable start date for this range, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.  Pieces are required left-to-right, but day or day and month may be left off.

startNaturalDate.tooltip: The range start date in a human readable format. This date should only be used for reference.

startDateType.tooltip: Defines the type of date of the start date in the range

startFuzzyRange.tooltip: If the start date is imprecise, i.e. 2nd century, use these fields to give bounds on the imprecision, i.e. 0100-0199

endMachineDate.tooltip: Machine-readable end date for this range, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.  Pieces are required left-to-right, but day or day and month may be left off.

endNaturalDate.tooltip: The range end date in a human readable format. This date should only be used for reference.

endDateType.tooltip: Defines the type of date of the end date in the range

endFuzzyRange.tooltip: If the end date is imprecise, i.e. 2nd century, use these fields to give bounds on the imprecision, i.e. 0100-0199

placeOriginal.tooltip: The text of this place entry

placeRole.tooltip: The role of this place in relation to the Constellation

placeGeoTerm.tooltip: A geographical place term from a controlled vocabulary of Geographical Places, i.e. GeoNames

placeGeoTermScore.tooltip: How likely it is that this GeoPlace is the place mentioned

placeGeoTermConfirmed.tooltip: This GeoPlace was human-confirmed to be the same place as the one mentioned in Original above

term.tooltip: The controlled-vocabulary term for this data element

uri.tooltip: The auto-populated URI for the Term selected above

xml.tooltip: The XML-source for this data element

sameAsText.tooltip: The human-readable text that appears in a relation entry

sameAsRole.tooltip: How this Identity Constellation is related to the external identity

sameAsURI.tooltip: The permanent link to the external identity

entityIdType.tooltip: What kind of identifier this entityID contains

entityIdURI.tooltip: The permanent link to the external identity

relationTarget.tooltip: The Constellation that is the target of the described relationship

relationType.tooltip: How this Identity Constellation is related to the Target

resourceRepository.tooltip: The numeric Identity Constellation ID (in SNAC) for the holding repository

resourceText.tooltip: The text that appears in relationEntry and acts as a display title

resourceRole.tooltip: How this Identity Constellation is related to the resource

resourceURI.tooltip: The permanent link (URI) to the external resource

resourceXML.tooltip: The XML of the object used to create this relationship

resourceOriginationName.tooltip: The creators or 'origination names' of this resource

sourceDisplayName.tooltip: The editor/human-readable name of this source, shown in the Citation box of the SCM entry box

sourceURI.tooltip: The permanent link (if one exists) to this external source

sourceText.tooltip: A textual representation of this source, i.e. a full bibliographic citation

scmSourceData.tooltip: The data for the described data element, as it appeared in the source

scmCitation.tooltip: The source object from this Constellation where the information on this data element was found

scmSubCitation.tooltip: A clarifying piece of information to refine the Citation, i.e. pages 12-15

scmDescriptiveRule.tooltip: The rule used in formulating the data element from the Source Data above
